section.title: Introduction
section.p: The Revision Controller controls the different reserved check-in and check-out of documents, the backup versions and the rollback. It is filesystem oriented

section.title: Check-in / Check-out
section.p: The check-in and check-out are reserved: a checked out document cannot be checked out by another user.
A user "System" exists, who can force internally a checkin
The different check-in/check-out states (the checkin/out, the time, the user's identity) of a document are stored in an xml file with a own markup language: the RCML-file.

section.title: Versions
section.p: When a document is checked in, the old version of the document is copied ( backup )

section.title: Rollback
section.p: It is also possible to retrieve an old version with the rollback
